tasks.use_case_description: Learn about a drug’s intended use, directions, effects, and side effects from easily accessible medical documentations (e.g., drug labels, online articles)
tasks.task_inspiration: Hypothyroidism is a common medical condition people experience, and Synthroid is one of the common prescribed drugs used to treat it.
tasks.cq_format: single-select MCQs with 5 options and one correct answer
